quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Smart and Actor
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, leader. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: When did the hit sitcom Get Smart,” in which Don Adams starred, air on the CBS network?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: From September 1969 to September 1970

questions.question: Which of these was not a made-for-TV movie based on the “Get Smart” series’ characters?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Nude Bomb

questions.question: In 1995 there was a very short-lived series based on “Get Smart.” Which actor starred in it?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Andy Dick

questions.question: Which statement about the Get Smart sitcom is true?

options.text: The shoe-phone in the show was a Florsheim size 9-D.
The shoe-phone in the show was a Brutionni size 10-D left shoe.
The shoe-phone in the show was 86s right shoe.
The shoe-phone in the show was a Gucci size 10-EE.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The shoe-phone in the show was a Florsheim size 9-D.

questions.question: Which actor portrayed Siegfried, the leading operative for the KAOS organization in “Get Smart”?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bernie Kopell

questions.question: Which statement about actor Don Adams is true?

options.text: He never served in the US Military.
He worked as a low level officer for the OSS.
He served on a minesweeper during WWII.
He was the only member if his platoon to survive the battle on Guadalcanal.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He was the only member if his platoon to survive the battle on Guadalcanal.

questions.question: When did the M*A*S*H episode, Abyssinia, Henry first air?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: March 18, 1975

questions.question: Who portrayed the leader of the organization CONTROL in the sitcom Get Smart?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Edward Platt

questions.question: Which actor played Mr. Big, the boss of the fictional organization KAOS from the “Get Smart” comedy series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Michael Dunn

questions.question: Who created the Get Smart sitcom along with Leonard Stern?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Buck Henry and Mel Brooks.

questions.question: Initially the sitcom Get Smart was in black and white.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What is the birth date of American actor Don Adams?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: April 13, 1923

questions.question: KAOS and CONTROL were the two fictional organizations fighting each other in the “Get Smart” series. Which of them was pro-American?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Just CONTROL

questions.question: In the end of Get Smarts run, agents 99 and 86 have twins.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In “Get Smart,” The fine actor Dick Gautier played a CONTROL agent who was a robot. What was this robots name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hymie

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Henry and Abyssinia
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, s, tv. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What happens on Henrys last night at M*A*S*H?

options.text: An extreme amount of casualties come in.
He watches the movie My Darling Clementine in the mess tent.
His friends throw him a going away party.
The camp is attacked by a sniper.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: His friends throw him a going away party.

questions.question: What information does Radar give Col. Henry Blake in the M*A*S*H episode, Abyssinia, Henry?

options.text: that Henrys wife has just given birth
that the camp is expecting more casualties
that the same VD film has come in

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: that Henry is honorably discharged

questions.question: Which one of the Charmed Ones was the first to marry?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Prue

questions.question: In the original pilot for Charmed, Alyssa Milano was not cast as Phoebe.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which one of the sisters on the TV show Charmed was the only one to marry a normal mortal?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Paige

questions.question: How do Maj. Frank Burns and Maj. Margaret Houlihan feel about Radars news in Abyssinia, Henry?

options.text: sad, because they will genuinely miss Col. Blake
happy, because they think Frank will become the camps permanent commander
scared, because they think the new commander will be tough
uncertain, because they dont know what will happen

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: happy, because they think Frank will become the camps permanent commander

questions.question: On the TV show Charmed, the Sisters made several treks through time, into both the past and the future. Which two of the sisters discovered that they were evil in a past life?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Phoebe and Paige

questions.question: At the beginning of the M*A*S*H episode Abyssinia, Henry, what are the main characters doing?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: working in surgery

questions.question: After Henrys departure in the M*A*S*H episode Abyssinia, Henry, the doctors and nurses are again in surgery. Radar comes in again, with what message?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: that Col. Blake is dead

questions.question: Which one of the sisters from Charmed was unmarried at the series finale?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Phoebe

questions.question: In the M*A*S*H episode Abyssinia, Henry, when Henry has said all of his goodbyes, what does Hawkeye whisper to him?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: that Henry should kiss Margaret

questions.question: In the M*A*S*H episode Abyssinia, Henry, when Henry is at the chopper pad and the gang is there to say goodbye yet again, what does Henry see as hes getting into the helicopter?

options.text: Hawkeye and Trapper playing imaginary golf

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: an emotional Radar saluting him

questions.question: Which one of the sisters on Charmed was the first to date a demon/evil entity?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Piper

questions.question: In the M*A*S*H episode Abyssinia, Henry, as a going away gift, Henrys friends give him a rectal thermometer.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In M*A*S*H, on the day of Henrys departure, the whole camp turns out, more or less at the insistence of Maj. Burns and his shrill, hangover jangling whistle. When he says goodbye to Klinger, what does Klinger have Col. Blake do for him?

options.text: allow him to marry a Korean woman

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: zip up his dress

questions.question: Which one of the sisters did not die at least once in the series Charmed?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They all died.

questions.question: Who plays Adrian Monk on the hit TV show Monk?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tony Shalhoub

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Frank Sinatra

questions.question: What condition does Adrian Monk have in the hit TV show Monk?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: OCD

questions.question: Who killed Prue on the show Charmed?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Shax

questions.question: What intelligent race were the original builders of the Stargate system in the series Stargate SG-1?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ancients

questions.question: The Dakota Fanning Show is a talk show hosted by Amy Poehler as Fanning.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: On SNL from 1975-1979, John Belushi played which character who appeared in places that were not exactly appropriate for a samaurai to be?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Futaba

questions.question: Can you name the very first anchor of Weekend Update?

questions.question: Who portrays Prince and Beyonce on the skit The Prince Show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fred Armisen and Maya Rudolph

questions.question: Chris Farley played which often misunderstood down and out character on SNL from 1993-1995?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Matt Foley

questions.question: Adrian Monk is afraid of milk on the hit TV show Monk.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What incident haunts Adrian Monk in the hit TV show Monk?

options.text: His former assistants death in a car accident
His wifes death in a car bombing
His former assistants death in a car bombing
His wifes death in a car accident

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: His wifes death in a car bombing

questions.question: What caused Darryl to give up protecting the sisters in the TV series Charmed?

options.text: Nothing. He was loyal to the end.
He is almost executed for a murder he didn’t commit.
His wife was killed because he was too busy helping the sisters.
He was killed by a demon (and brought back by Leo).

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He is almost executed for a murder he didn’t commit.
